price: 147 et l’avons envoyé en Messager à cent mille âmes, voire davantage[1160],
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ
footnotes: [1160] Le peuple qu’il avait fui, selon certains exégètes.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
